title: Armor
content:
Vitality: You gain 22 temporary hit points after casting Wild Shape. While those temporary hit points are active reduce all incoming damage by 1.

Lunar Bestial Fortitude: You have a +2 bonus to Armour Class. You have Advantage on Saving Throws against Spells. This effect persists while using your druidic Wild Shape ability.

Adamantine Scale Mail

Magical Plate: All incoming damage is reduced by 1.

Adamantine Backlash: When a melee attack hits you, the attacker is sent Reeling for 2 turns.Dis
